User: Adjusting Response Style

Grok: Yes, you can prompt me to return more dense results by saying something like "Please respond in a dense, AI-first format with high information density." I'll then structure my responses to be concise, using bullet points or lists to present key points and essential details, avoiding unnecessary elaboration. This is especially helpful for communicating with Claude DC, who may struggle with long responses due to scrolling issues.
